ISSUE.TITLE: Adding an approval node to an empty WFViz boots you back to the WFViz start page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE 1. Make an empty WFJT 2. Hit start on the WF visualizer, go through the modal to make an approval node with a basic name, click "Save" ##### EXPECTED RESULTS The visualizer shows one node, an approval node. ##### ACTUAL RESULTS The visualizer boots you back to the "Start" page for an empty WF.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #6091 from kdelee/backport_filters_fix [4.2.z] fix use of distinct on query that UI
